channel.title: hey guys i got a question
channel.description: is there any mods and such that are kinda like the half life 2. are something that tells part of the story. i sadly never had a chance to play the first half life game. so what im trying to say i i look for mod for half life 2. but im not sure what are good ones. i prefer single player one with good story. i have play smod but it made half life not work right. think you.

item.title: hey guys i got a question
item.dc:creator: kewl
item.description:
RabidMonkey:

If you want to play through the original to understand the story, just buy the game, it’s 7 dollars on Steam and probably cheaper on Ebay, or if you’re lucky enough to find a box copy. There aren’t really many mods that explain or elaborate on the main story arc of the game…

It was only 2 dollars yesterday.

item.dc:creator: ManlyStump
item.description:

And JohnWorfin, you don’t need to specify the units twice
